named-query.name: customerBalance
named-query.query: SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN i.discountType = DiscountTypes.PERCENT THEN (SUM(ii.countValue * ii.sellPrice) - (i.discountValue / 100 * SUM(ii.countValue * ii.sellPrice))) - SUM(ip.payAmount) ELSE SUM(ii.countValue * ii.sellPrice) - i.discountValue END ) FROM InvoiceModel i JOIN FETCH CustomerModel c JOIN FETCH InvoiceItemModel ii JOIN FETCH InvoicePaymentModel ip WHERE i.isActive = true AND c.id = :cId
